name: Kiss In Public
description:
Kiss in Public - Flirt, Date, Don’t Get Caught!

Get ready for the best kissing and flirting game ever! Can you be the best kisser without getting caught? You need to time each kiss to perfection! Choose the right time in order to kiss your dream boy! Complete the risky tasks and be the best kisser. Oh and dont forget a little flirting with strangers or someone you have a huge crush on...just dont get caught! Kissing in Public is fun right? In the car, in the garden, in your girlfriend or boyfriend’s house, at school, the theatre, the beach!But nobody wants to get caught - I mean its not cool making out and having your parents or brother or sister bust in you!

So many different levels and places for you to have that perfect kiss, but be prepared its not going to be easy to kiss your way through. There will many people not wanting to steal those perfect kisses, so you are going to have to smart, secretive and use all your powers to avoid getting caught! Think of all those places you always wanted to have that secret kiss with your boyfriend or girlfriend - the street, the park, at home, the theater ,the beach, on top of a mountain, your classroom or where ever you can think of! Even in the car but be careful and dont kiss and drive. So go on, have that Kiss in Public you always dreamed about...just dont get caught!
